fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Replace the app.js with the code below:
{code}
alert(Ti.Platform.displayCaps.density);
{code}
2. Build & run the app on Nexus 6 device.

h5.Actual Results:
1. The alert shows the displayCaps.density property to be "medium", but Nexus 6 has a resolution of 1440 x 2560 pixels & 493ppi density.
2. A Nexus 5 which is 1080 x 1920 pixels & 445ppi density shows as "xxhigh" for the same code.

h5.Expected Results:
1. We should see xxhigh or more for displayCaps.density for Nexus 6.
fields.summary: Android: DisplayCaps density for nexus 6 is shown as medium
